name: Heat Pump HVAC Rebate
description: Up to $10,000 rebate ($3,000 per ton) for replacing gas furnace and/or AC with high-efficiency electric heat pump HVAC; income-qualified customers may receive up to $11,000
fullDescription: Silicon Valley Power offers one of the most generous heat pump HVAC rebates in California for Santa Clara residents replacing gas furnaces.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $10,000 rebate ($3,000 per ton)
- Up to $11,000 for income-qualified customers
- Replaces gas furnace and/or AC
- High-efficiency heat pump provides heating and cooling
- Significant energy savings
- Improved indoor air quality
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Silicon Valley Power customer
2. Replace gas furnace and/or AC with heat pump
3. Use licensed HVAC contractor
4. Apply online through SVP rebate platform
5. Submit proof of purchase and installation
6. Income-qualified submit additional documentation
keywords: Silicon Valley Power, SVP, heat pump HVAC, Santa Clara, $10000, $11000, gas furnace, heating, cooling, air conditioning
